blackengine.gameLogic.components.base

Class ComponentBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • blackengine.gameLogic.components.base.ComponentBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActionListenerComponent, BehaviourComponent, CameraComponent, CollisionComponent, MouseListenerComponent, MovementComponent, PointLightComponent, RenderComponent

    public abstract class ComponentBase
extends java.lang.Object
    The base of all components used for the entity system of BlackEngine. If the implementing class is registered using the registerComponent(Class, Float) method, the component will be 'Active'. Active components will be updated using their update() and lateUpdate() methods in order of their priority every frame by their parent Entity. Passive components will not be updated using their update() or lateUpdate() methods.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void activate()
      Activates this component by settings its active flag to true and calling onActivate().
      void deactivate()
      Deactivates this component by setting its active flag to false and calling onDeactivate().
      void destroy()
      Deactivates this component, sets its flags for destruction.
      java.lang.Class<? extends ComponentBase> getMapping()
      Retrieves the Class that will be used to map update priority in the LogicEngine.
      Entity getParent()
      Getter for the parent of this component.
      boolean isActive()
      Getter for the active flag.
      boolean isDestroyed()
      Getter for whether this component is flagged for destruction or not.
      void lateUpdate()
      Gets called after the update() method;
      void onActivate()
      Gets called whenever this component is activated.
      void onDeactivate()
      Gets called whenever this component is deactivated.
      void setParent(Entity parent)
      Setter for the parent of this component.
      void update()
      Update method will be called every frame if this implementation of ComponentBase was registered in the LogicEngine.
